Hi all just to check. I kinda need to use my UOB KF card today but it hasn't arrived. Does adding it to google pay mean that it is considered as online spend (coz to earn 3mpd should be online spend)  or is it considered as mobile contactless?

Tap machine using card is contactless.Tap machine using phone is mobile contactless.Paid using gpay is online.Mobile contactless won't show as gpay  it will show up as how you do it using card to tap on machine.

So did U do something to let trust or scb know u are unemployed.Granting them access to SingPass data which contains employer / cpf contribution / Noa is a sure way to sabotage yourself.Always read what they are pulling from SingPass before u say yes.

One last hope / chance for uDo u have investment income be it SSBs or tbills or rental or fixed deposit.At least show something. They can still give u a minimal credit limit.

If you ain't working  chances are you will get lesser credit or no credit limit  think of it as a loan. Banks need some form of record to show that you have a way of paying them back (or rather  a proof that you can pay your CC bills)
